tasks.label: Quick Ullmann Ligand Smoke Test
args: from enhanced_recommendation_engine import create_recommendation_engine; e=create_recommendation_engine(); recs=e.get_recommendations('Brc1ccccc1.NH2c1ccccc1>>Nc1ccccc1','C-N Coupling - Ullmann'); ligs=recs.get('ligand_recommendations',[])[:5]; print('TOP', [(r['ligand'], r.get('compatibility_score')) for r in ligs]); print('TYPE', recs.get('reaction_type'))
